entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: CancellationTokens/CancellationTokenSources with reasons and/or custom exceptions #109246
  • `StackOverflowException` for WASM app with `tail.` instruction #109245
  • .net core TLS server certificate with private key in TPM #109243
    Future
  • Assembly::Load crashes C++/CLI app in try block with 9.0.0-rc.2.24473.5 #109242
  • Missing OperationCanceledException in .NET 6 #109239
  • The type initializer for 'NetSecurityNative' throws meaningless exception rendering corrective action impossible. #109236
  • ILAsm versions 6.0 or higher force the strong name signed corflag which conflicts with sn test signing #109227
    10.0.0
  • Cleanup `NET8_0_OR_GREATER` symbol #109226
  • how to ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance and ActivatorUtilities.CreateFactory() use KeyedService? #109223
  • [mono] AOT-llvm arm64 Performance runs crashing since 2024/09/30 #109220
  • BlockingCollection can get back to uncompleted state even after `IsCompleted` was true #109217
  • [mono] bug about sgen `check-remset-consistency` check #109215
  • Missing ref modifier in COM method call does not throw compilation error but results in empty output parameter #109214
    Future
  • Application Build with sdk .NET9 rc-1 and .NET9 rc-2 were not working in Azure app service(Linux) #109212

Closed

  • ILAsm versions 5.0 or higher fail when given a res file generated by ILDasm #109225
    10.0.0
  • Dependency Injection fails to resolve dependency when using Primary constructor with "in" keyword #105924
    10.0.0
  • Runtime repo signing is broken inside the VMR #109178
  • Runtime thread names #34276

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove ManagedThreadBase_FullTransition/NoADTransition distinction #109249
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix typo `commmon` -> `common` #109248
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution
  • Define __assume on unix #109247
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix unhandled exception test for composite r2r case #109244
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Update all devcontainers to noble #109241
    area-Meta
  • Use floating tag for webassembly image #109240
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix servicing version of Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting #109238
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • JIT: empty array enumerator opt #109237
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add forwarding support for WasmLinkage on LibraryImport #109234
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [wasm] Re-enable skiasharp WBT tests #109232
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 10.0.0
  • Remove unnecessary unsafe keywords #109231
    area-System.Collections
  • [cdac] Implement `IXCLRDataProcess::GetTaskByOSThreadID` #109230
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Conditionally check the compiler flags in libs.native #109228
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: fix naot-llvm abi #109224
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Factor LibraryImports in `System.Transactions.Local` to Common\ #109222
    area-System.Transactions, community-contribution
  • Detect mask usage for Across functions #109218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • use `Stopwatch.GetElapsedTime` for rate limiter #109213
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Update ThunkGenerator to handle multi-nested classes #109210
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • JIT: enable devirtualization/inlining of other array interface methods #109209
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Check for boxes in fgAddrCouldBeNull #109208
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Cleanup `NET6_0_OR_GREATER` #109229
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Ship the minipal as a separate static lib to avoid circular dependencies #109233
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update host test RID fallbacks to include arm64 #109235
    area-Host
  • Cleanup NET8_0_OR_GREATER ifdef in json converters #109176
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Expose additional JIT metrics #109035
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Propagate LCL_ADDRs into natural loops #109190
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove `MethodDesc::GetSig` #109211
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Move `Intrinsic` generation to use the transient code gen for `CopyConstruct`. #109129
    area-Interop-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • SPMI: Fix superpmi.py tpdiff report generation #109216
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Forward the ForceDryRunSigning variable down to the runtime inner build #109206
    area-Infrastructure
  • Update `wellknownattributes.h` #109191
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0

Updated

  • Enable for PAC while compiling coreclr (not the jitted code) #108561
    arch-arm64, os-linux, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add draft of runtime async ECMA-335 changes #104063
    area-Meta
  • Use `Unsafe.BitCast` for generic span casting #109136
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution
  • Move static helpers to managed #108167
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Remove PAL_Random and move palrt APIs into the minipal #108999
    area-Infrastructure
  • Disable some red tests for crossgen2 and associate with issue URLs #109204
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Set InstructionSet_EVEX flag in altjit. #108534
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Linux/arm: LSRA resolution issues #109173
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add DI specification test for ensuring externally provided instance services are not disposed on provider disposal. #104853
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Add overview of runtime logging to the Book of the Runtime #98881
    documentation, area-Meta, runtime-coreclr
  • Add managed MachO signing #108992
    area-HostModel
  • Move unboxing helpers to managed code #109135
    area-VM-coreclr
  • implement optimized nibblemap #108939
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add trim annotations to System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager #108464
    area-System.Configuration, 10.0.0
  • Fixed dependency injection event source tests randomly failing. #107465
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Add support for building with Clang 19 #109198
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Opt `emitLoadImmediate` #109062
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • All `WasmBuildTests` use `dotnet new`, unification #109069
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • Factor LibraryImports into Common\ for System.Diagnostics.EventLog #109196
    area-System.Diagnostics.EventLog, community-contribution
  • add new JsonIgnoreAttribute WhenWriting/WhenReading #104562
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Re-enable trimming of library tests on Apple mobile #104097
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 10.0.0
  • Use merged runners for ios tests #107118
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] fix the building error for "PalInterlockedCompareExchange128" #108364
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • Fix stack overflow in compiler-generated state #109207
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Allow stack allocate objects in loops #106526
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Replace a few SuppressMessage annotations with UnconditionalSuppressMessage #109186
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • [browser] fix 4GB JS interop #109079
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Move arithmetic helpers to managed code #109087
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add VPCLMULQDQ intrinsics #109137
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • FileShare change to ReadWrite #109104
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Fold null checks against known non-null values #109164
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
